name: Canyon Defense TD
description:
Build towers & develop your strategy to defend the canyon!

Canyon Defense 3D is the best tower defense game on the market! 

During the game, enemies will try to break zone defense. The main tactic is to plan your base defense and carefully manage resources by building and upgrading the most efficient towers to protect the canyon.

The core of the game is still the same: enemies rush at your defenses, trying to destroy them by any means necessary. Try to stop them using the towers!

Jump into epic tower defense combat, take command of powerful turrets, hone your strategy skills and become the ultimate commander of your army to defend the canyon.

Canyon Defense is one of the most engaging TD games available on mobile!

Get ready to defend your colony against hordes of armored vehicles, tanks, drones and other dangerous enemies. Make your strategy to defend the entire Canyon.

FEATURES

★ +30 exciting levels.

★ Multiple types of enemies

★ +10 powerful towers, including laser gun, missile launcher, machine gun, walls, Xdestroyer.

★ Upgrade system allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy.

★ Multiple upgrade buildings for advantages: +range, +hp, +fire rate etc.

★ HD 3D graphics and special effects.

★ Optimized for Android phones and tablets.

Contact us if you have any suggestions on magstudioromania@gmail.com
